content.executive_summary: ChainTrust is a blockchain-powered SaaS platform that integrates three core modules—Proof-of-Ownership, Smart-Contract Escrow, and Subscription Sharing Manager—into a single, easy-to-use ecosystem. Our mission is to democratize digital ownership and trust by providing a secure, transparent, and low-cost alternative to centralized platforms. This document outlines the product requirements for the Minimum Viable Product (MVP) and the long-term vision for ChainTrust.
content.mission_statement: To make digital ownership, trust, and fair transactions accessible to everyone—instantly, globally, and securely—using blockchain technology.
business_objectives: Launch the MVP with all three core modules within 90 days.
Acquire 5,000+ free-tier users and 500 paying users in Year 1.
Establish ChainTrust as the go-to blockchain trust platform for creators and freelancers within 24 months.

target_customers: Digital Creators (photographers, designers, video editors, writers)

competitive_landscape.competitive_advantage: All-in-one platform, faster onboarding, blockchain-backed trust, and significantly lower fees.

industry_trends: Rapid creator economy growth ($250B+ projected by 2030).
Growth of micro-transactions and group purchases.
Consumers seeking more transparent digital agreements.

functionality: Upload any file (image, video, document, audio).
Instantly hash the file and store it on the blockchain and IPFS.
Generate a unique, timestamped ownership certificate.
Funds held in smart contract until work is approved.
Built-in dispute resolution with mediator assignment.

module_3_subscription_sharing_manager.description: Trustless payment pooling for group subscriptions.
functionality: Create smart contract pools for subscriptions.
Automated collection of payments from group members.
Automatic payout to the subscription owner.

features: 1 subscription pool with up to 2 members.
Up to 10 subscription pools with 10 members each.

smart_contract_specifications.proof_of_ownership: ContentOwnershipRegistry contract with functions: registerContent, verifyContent, transferOwnership.
smart_contract_specifications.smart_contract_escrow: FreelanceEscrow contract with functions: createEscrow, approveWork, raiseDispute, resolveDispute.
smart_contract_specifications.subscription_sharing_manager: SubscriptionPool contract with functions: createPool, joinPool, paySubscription, payoutToOwner.

timeline: Weeks 1-2: Smart contract architecture and integration.
Weeks 3-4: Build and deploy Proof-of-Ownership module.
Weeks 5-6: Build and deploy Smart-Contract Escrow module.
Weeks 7-8: Build and deploy Subscription Sharing Manager module.
Weeks 9-10: UI/UX polish, marketing site, and private beta.

go_to_market_strategy.week_1: Seeding: Recruit 50 early adopters from target communities.
go_to_market_strategy.week_2: Content Push: Publish blog/video tutorials and short-form video clips.
go_to_market_strategy.week_3: Product Hunt + Influencer Drops: Launch on major platforms and partner with YouTubers.
go_to_market_strategy.week_4: Viral Loop Activation: Launch referral program and #ProofOnChain Challenge.

milestones: Month 6: Paid subscriptions live, 200 Pro users.
Month 9: API launch for enterprise use.
